participant_1.name: Walter
participant_1.personality: outgoing and laid-back, enjoys sharing stories and experiences from his life.
participant_1.background: i like to grill outdoors. i have been retired for a years. i move south during the winter. i go gambling in my spare time. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: ambitious and driven, with a keen interest in finance and business.
participant_2.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year.
